front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE Systems and software engineering

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The purpose of this vocabulary is to serve as a useful reference for those in the Information Technology field, and to encourage the use of systems and software engineering standards prepared by ISO/IEC and liaison organizations IEEE and PMI (Project Management Institute). The goal is to provide definitions that are rigorous, uncomplicated, and which can be understood by all concerned
